name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Watch Pro
description: Advanced fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, GPS, and smartphone notifications. Water-resistant with 7-day battery life.

name: Leather Messenger Bag
description: Handcrafted genuine leather messenger bag with multiple compartments. Perfect for work or travel. Fits 15-inch laptop.

name: Minimalist Desk Lamp
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. USB charging port included. Energy efficient.

name: Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Set
description: Ergonomic wireless keyboard and mouse combo. Quiet keys, long battery life, and universal compatibility.

name: Cotton T-Shirt Pack
description: Pack of 3 premium cotton t-shirts. Soft, breathable, and durable. Available in multiple colors.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof portable speaker with 360Â° sound, 12-hour battery, and built-in microphone for calls.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with cushioned sole and breathable mesh. Ideal for daily runs and workouts.

name: Yoga Mat Premium

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle

name: USB-C Hub Adapter
description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0 ports, SD card reader, and power delivery. Perfect for laptops.
